scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n gChartcolour -o build/g-chartcolour.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/g-chartcolour.js -c -m -o build/g-chartcolour.min.js && node doc.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/g-chartcolour.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/g-chartcolour.js build/g-chartcolour.min.js
